item.title: CME Group, FanDuel Partner on New Stock, Commodity Bets
item.description: Lynne Fitzpatrick, CME Group President and CFO, says the partnership with FanDuel is about distribution to customers, with FanDuel seeking additional access to financial market products. She tells Rom

item.title: FanDuel to Offer Bets on Stocks and Commodities
item.description: FanDuel, the online gambling division of Flutter Entertainment Plc, is teaming up with CME Group Inc., the largest US derivatives exchange, to offer bets on stocks, commodity prices and even inflation

item.title: FanDuel to Offer Bets on Stocks and Commodities
item.description: FanDuel, the online gambling division of Flutter Entertainment Plc, is teaming up with CME Group Inc., the largest US derivatives exchange, to offer bets on stocks, commodity prices and even inflation
